bibl.title: Bishops of the Patriarchate of Alexandria travelling to meet their Patriarch in Late Antiquity and Early Middle Ages: A study of the motives and duration of their journeys
bibl.seg: Ewa Wipszycka, Bishops of the patriarchate of Alexandria travelling to meet their patriarch in late Antiquity and early Middle ages. A study of the motives and duration of their journeys.
1. Bishops travelling from Egypt, Libya inferior and Pentapolis to Alexandria. - 2. The journeys of Nubian and Ethiopian bishops. - 3. Final remarks.
bibl.note: 1. Bishops travelling from Egypt, Libya inferior and Pentapolis to Alexandria. - 2. The journeys of Nubian and Ethiopian bishops. - 3. Final remarks.
